Class MIMESender

java.lang.Object

      com.ericdaugherty.mail.server.services.smtp.MIMESender
Direct Known Subclasses:
SMTPRemoteSender
public class MIMESender
extends MIMEConstants

Each line of an outgoing message is parsed using rfc MIME rules.

Author:
Andreas Kyrmegalos
